responsibilities: Engineering a digital twin of the brain by implementing core mathematical models using NumPy and SciPy to simulate brain behavior with at least 90% accuracy for use in brain function analysis

Developed and tested 10 interactive Matplotlib visualizations for 5 key brain wave bands (Delta-Gamma) for scientific publications, translating complex simulation data into insights for researchers, medical professionals, and the general public

Implemented backend user session duration tracking with AWS Amplify and Amazon DynamoDB, enabling the internal team to keep track of the average user session duration

Modified and tested the frontend and backend features with Android Studio and AWS Amplify, such as disabling the register button for further study and improving the user session duration feature, ensuring the seamless deployment of the application

Enhanced the onboarding process of Kai, an AI teaching assistant, with 12 individuals globally by implementing a persistent progress bar and system configuration page with React.js, Next.js, Material UI, and Google Firebase

Engineered the frontend UI of ReX, an AI coach who serves as a steadfast career companion for learners, with React.js, Material UI, Redux, and OpenAI API, achieving an average chatbot response time of 5 seconds
